Module uk.ac.soton.comp1206
Package uk.ac.soton.comp1206.game

Class MultiplayerGame

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.game.Game
uk.ac.soton.comp1206.game.MultiplayerGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
CommunicationsListener
public class MultiplayerGame extends Game implements CommunicationsListener
MultiplayerGame holds the logic for a multiplayer game Extends Game class because the main logic is the same

      rows - number of rows
      comm - communicator object to communicate with the server
